settings.instructions:
Select each official to read their quote.
Judge Diane Wood © 2011 AP Images All other images of officials are Public Domain
settings.intro: Time to study some famous words. Good luck, citizen.

rollovers.rollover: "No man is above the law, and no man is below it." - President Theodore Roosevelt
"Transparency and the rule of law will be the touchstones of this presidency." - President Barack Obama
"The clearest way to show what the rule of law means to us in everyday life is to recall what has happened when there is no rule of law." - President Dwight Eisenhower
"Neither laws nor the procedures used to create or implement them should be secret." - U.S. Court of Appeals Judge Diane Wood
"When we talk about the rule of law, we assume that weÕre talking about a law that promotes freedom, that promotes justice, that promotes equality." - U.S. Supreme Court Justice Anthony Kennedy
